product_data.title: CLAYCO Matcha Detox Clay Mask | Deep Cleansing & Brightening | Green Tea & Collagen | Tan Removal & Dark Spot Reduction | Vegan Japanese Skincare | 50ml
reviews: I really wanted to give a try to this brand & being an oily skin girlie clay mask is something that I am really fond of & this clay mask does the job sooo pretty well. Just leave it on for 10 mins & it makes my skin smooth & detoxifies. Happy with it.
I absolutely loved the product, my skin was glowing and it was such a soothing effect.
Seriously it’s so so good . I just love how instantly it calmed my skin and I could see visible  glow. Definitely worth the hype and money ✨
The Clay Mask works wonders! It cleanses deeply without drying out my skin. After use, my pores look smaller, and my skin feels smoother and brighter. Highly recommend!
I haven't seen any effect of this face pack on my face so I will say its okayish.
Really liked this mask, skin feels smooth and soft after usage. Perfect face mask for Oily Skin and worth the price. High quality face mask
